Vďaka oficiálnej mobilnej aplikácii Integrovaného dopravného systému v Bratislavskom kraji (IDS BK) máte cestovné lístky na mestskú aj regionálnu dopravu vždy doslova pod palcom. V mobilnej aplikácii IDS BK ich kúpite jednoducho, rýchlo, ekologicky a naviac so zľavou.

Cestujte s jedným lístkom v celom Bratislavskom kraji. Prestupujte neobmedzene medzi vlakmi, autobusmi a električkami.

Nezáleží na tom, či budete cestovať autobusmi Arriva, využijete vlaky ZSSK, alebo sa zveziete mestskou hromadnou dopravou v Bratislave.

Viac informácií nielen o mobilnej aplikácii IDS BK, ale o cestovaní v celom Bratislavskom kraji nájdete na stránke https://www.idsbk.sk/informacie/.

Čo s aplikáciou dokážete?

• vyhľadávať spojenia so zobrazením aktuálneho meškania vozidla
• sledovať reálne odchody spojov na zastávkovej tabuli 
• prezerať si cestovné poriadky
• nakupovať jednorazové, denné a týždenné cestovné lístky
• platiť z dobitého kreditu v aplikácii alebo platobnou kartou
• dostávať aktuálne informácie o dianí, zmenách a výlukách spojov

Aké sú výhody nákupu lístka cez aplikáciu?

• rýchly a moderný nákup cestovného lístka bez hotovosti
• jeden lístok platný u viacerých dopravcov v celom Bratislavskom kraji
• kratšia doba aktivácie a nižšia cena oproti SMS

Ako na to?

• vyberte cestovný lístok
• zvoľte nástupnú zastávku alebo povoľte prístup k GPS a zastávku doplníme za Vás
• zaplaťte (dobitým kreditom alebo platobnou kartou)
• počkajte 30 sekúnd na aktiváciu lístka
• cestujte :)

Or point your device at a plane to find out where it’s going and what kind of aircraft it is. Download for free today and discover why millions are already tracking flights and checking flight status with Flightradar24.

•Watch aircraft move around the world in real-time
•Identify flights overhead & see flight information—including a photo of the actual aircraft—by simply pointing your device at the sky 
•See what the pilot of an aircraft sees in 3D 
•Tap on a plane for flight details such as route, estimated time of arrival, actual time of departure, aircraft type, speed, altitude, high-resolution photos of the actual aircraft & more.
•See historical data & watch playback of past flights
•Tap on an airport icon for arrival & departure boards, flight status, aircraft on the ground, current delay stats, & detailed weather conditions
•Search for individual flights using flight number, airport, or airline
•Filter flights by airline, aircraft, altitude, speed, & more
•Get a detailed list of all flights in the air in your area on your Apple Watch
 
Flightradar24 is a free app and includes all the above features. If you want even more great features from Flightradar24 | Flight Tracker there are two upgrade options—Silver & Gold—and each comes with a free trial.
 
Silver
•90 days of flight history
•More aircraft details, like serial number & age
•More flight details, like vertical speed & squawk
•Filters and alerts to find and track the flights you’re interested in
•Current weather at 3,000+ airports overlaid on the map
 
Gold 
•All the features included in Flightradar24 Silver +
•365 days of flight history
•Detailed live map weather layers for clouds & precipitation
•Aeronautical charts & oceanic tracks showing the pathways flights follow across the sky
•Air traffic control boundaries that show which controllers are responsible for a flight
•Extended Mode S data— even more information about a flight’s altitude, speed, and wind & temperature conditions during flight, when available
 
If you choose to upgrade to a Silver or Gold subscription, a payment will be charged to your iTunes account at the end of the free trial period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your account settings in the iTunes Store. Silver and Gold upgrade prices are listed in the app as they vary depending on your country and currency. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable.

HOW IT WORKS
Most aircraft today are equipped with ADS-B transponders that transmit positional data. Flightradar24 has a rapidly growing network of 20,000 ground stations to receive this data that then shows up as aircraft moving on a map in the app. In an expanding number of regions, with the help of multilateration, we’re able to calculate the positions of aircraft that don’t have ADS-B transponders. Coverage is subject to change at any time.

The eznamka application offers all users of charged motorways and expressways in Slovakia, regardless of their country of origin, a convenient and fast way to:

- purchase of cashless electronic vignettes for charged motorways and expressways in Slovak Republic,
- validity check of already purchased electronic vignettes,
- submit a customer complaint, request, claim or complaint,
- correction of data of already purchased electronic vignettes,
- get all necessary information on the operation of the electronic vignette system in the Slovak Republic.

The electronic vignette is a fee for the use of motorways and expressways in the Slovak Republic, which is linked to a certain period of time, regardless of the number of journeys. In terms of temporal validity, vignettes can be purchased with annual, 365-day, 30-day or 10-day validity, with:

- 10 days – Time based allowance to drive on specified road sections of the charged road network in Slovakia which is valid for 10 days from the date specified by the customer (including the day of starting date); - 30 days – Time based allowance to drive on specified road sections of the charged road network in Slovakia which is valid for 30 days from the date specified by the customer (including the day of starting date);
- 365 days – Time based allowance to drive on specified road sections of the charged road network in Slovakia which is valid for 365 days from the date specified by the customer (including the day of starting date);
- 1 year– Time based allowance to drive on specified road sections of the charged road network in Slovakia which is valid from 1st of January of the relevant calendar year (or the day of payment for the vignette by the customer in the relevant calendar year) until 31 January of the next calendar year.

S aplikáciou Horská záchranná služba si v prípade núdze privoláš pomoc jedným tlačidlom, zdieľaš svoju polohu so záchranármi a máš prehľad o počasí, výstrahách a teréne.

Privolanie pomoci
Pomoc si privoláš jedným tlačidlom. Stlačením tlačidla odošleš núdzovú správu a zároveň si prepojený na dispečing Horskej záchrannej služby. Okrem GPS polohy zdieľaš zdravotné údaje, špecifikáciu problému, kontakty na blízke osoby a ďalšie dôležité informácie, ktoré urýchlia pomoc.

Kniha vychádzok a túr
Opatrnosti na horách nikdy nie je dosť a preto si svoju túru dôkladne naplánuj. Pomôže ti v tom elektronická kniha vychádzok a túr, kde vyberieš oblasť pohybu, štart a cieľ túry a jej časové trvanie, navyše dostaneš aj varovania a výstrahy pred živelnými alebo inými život ohrozujúcich udalosťami v danej oblasti. Ak budeme mať o tebe tieto informácie a ty sa nám po návrate z túry neozveš, prídeme ti na pomoc.

Miesta záujmu
Aplikácia podľa tvojho GPS určí, kde sa nachádzaš a ukáže ti oblastné strediská Horskej záchrannej služby, najbližšie záchranné zdravotné stanice, databázu automatizovaných externých defibrilátorov (AED), horské chaty, meteostanice s aktuálnymi informáciami o počasí, vrátane webových kamier.

Varovania a výstrahy
Nespoliehaj sa na to, že sa ti nič nestane, spoľahni sa radšej na aplikáciu, ktorá ti pre oblasti slovenských hôr zobrazí výstrahy pre daný deň, lavínové nebezpečenstvo i počasie a ty sa tak vrátiš v poriadku domov. Ak nie si profík, tak pre teba máme aj pravidlá pohybu na horách, horské záchranné „desatoro“, základy prvej pomoci, vrátanie interaktívneho návodu resuscitácie.

Fungovanie v zahraničí
Pomoc jedným tlačidlom si privoláš aj v Česku, Maďarsku a Rakúsku, kde sú tiesňový hovor a núdzová SMS presmerované na záchrannú zdravotnú službu alebo horskú službu danej krajiny. Jedna aplikácia ti tak pomôže vo viacerých krajinách bez nutnosti sťahovania lokálnej appky------------------------------
With the HZS Slovak Mountain Rescue app, you can call for help in an emergency with the touch of a single button, share your exact location with rescue teams, and receive updates on weather, hazard, and terrain conditions.

Calling for Help 
Call for help with a single button; pressing the button sends an emergency message and connects you with the Mountain Rescue Service emergency line at the same time. In addition to your GPS location, the message will also share your health details, the specifics of your emergency, next of kin contacts, and all other important information to speed up your rescue. 

My Trips
Being careful in the mountains is never enough, so always plan your trip thoroughly. The app’s My Trips section will help you with that; just enter the region and your route’s starting and destination points, and duration. You will also receive warnings and alerts about natural disasters or other life-threatening situations in the local area. Plus, if you enter your trip details but do not then confirm through the app that you have made it safely to your destination, the nearest Mountain Rescue team will come to your rescue. 

Points of Interest
The app uses your GPS location to determine where you are and shows you the nearest regional Mountain Rescue Service centres, emergency medical rooms, publicly-accessible AEDs, mountain refuges, and weather stations with up-to-date weather information including webcams. 

Warnings and Alerts
Never believe that nothing will happen to you - it’s far wiser to rely on an app that gives you 24hr hazard, avalanche risk, and weather updates for each of the Slovak mountain regions so you can then return home safely.

When Abroad 
You can also use the app to call for help in the Czech Republic, Hungary and Austria; your emergency call and SMS are both redirected to the nearest regional Emergency Medical Service or local Mountain Rescue Service. This single app will help you in several countries without the need to download further foreign apps.

Skyscanner makes planning your next trip easy.

Save time and money by comparing and booking from your favorite travel brands like Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, and American Airlines all in one place, too. There are no booking fees or hidden charges – just the best prices. Here’s how to use our app: 

Find inspiration
Can’t decide where? Perfect. Start by exploring everywhere first. Tap “Everywhere” in our search bar to find cheap flights literally anywhere around the world and get ideas for your next vacation.

Filter your search
Know what you’re looking for? Use our smart filters to search by flight duration, airline, number of stops, travel class, departure and arrival times.

The best time to fly
You’ve chosen where it will be, now to find the best dates to book your vacation. Our calendar view breaks down the cheapest dates in a chosen month so you can find the right flight deal. Not ready to book yet? Set up a Price Alert and we’ll let you know when the flight price changes so you’re always booking at the right time.

The right hotel at the right place
Thought we were just about cheap flights? Nope, we’ve got your stay covered too. Compare and book cheap deals from thousands of hotels, resorts, apartments, motels and hostels all over the world. Or find rooms near your current location and grab a last-minute deal for your next vacation. 

Rent a car
Choose where and when to pick up your car rental, and we’ll show you cheap prices and deals. You can filter your search by vehicle type, fuel type and features. And our Fair Fuel Policy flag will make sure you’re not paying too much on fuel – we’ve got your back.

Book with who you trust
Compare all your top travel brands in one place – Spirit Airlines, United Airlines, American Airlines, JetBlue, Frontier Airlines, Delta, Ctrip, Expedia, Kiwi.com, Trip.com, Agoda and more. Plus, get recent reviews on our travel partners from our community of travelers.

Find the greenest flights

Save your flights

RYDE je nová, slovenská, digitálna TAXI aplikácia, prostredníctvom ktorej sa môžete kvalitne a rýchlo prepravovať. Začíname v Bratislave. Prichádzame, aby sme našim novým klientom, ale i dopravcom a obyvateľom Bratislavy priniesli kvalitné služby a profesionalitu. Nemusíte sa báť, že nás bežne nespoznáte, pretože pred objednaním budete presne vedieť akým vozidlom Vás naši zmluvný taxikári prepravia. RYDE má svoju jednotnú flotilu len nových bezpečných, moderných a komfortných vozidiel.


Prečo práve RYDE ? ..... lebo Vám ponúka:
- Transparentnosť - objednávanie prepravy klientom za férové ceny prostredníctvom modernej digitálnej aplikácie a cestovné sa zobrazí klientovi ešte pred objednaním jazdy.
- Jednotnosť - pred objednaním bude klient presne vedieť, akým vozidlom ho dopravca prepraví (našu flotilu bude tvoriť jedna značka i jeden model vozidla).
- Bezpečnosť – naše nové najmodernejšie automobily vybavené najnovšími bezpečnostnými prvkami pre bezpečnosť klienta.
- Ekológia - najekologickejšie vozidla s najnižšími emisiami (splodinami) CO2 - „nízko emisná taxislužba“.
- Kvalita - pohodlná jazda v našich nových, čistých a bezpečných automobiloch so spoľahlivým a zodpovedným vodičom.
- Zdravie - v čase pandemických opatrení všetky naše vozidlá budú vybavené deliacou prepážkou medzi vodičom a klientom, aby sme zabezpečili pre klienta ale i vodiča bezpečnejšie prostredie. Chceme minimalizovať riziko šírenia nákazy.
- Ústretovosť - prevádzková doba 24 hodín denne, 7 dní v týždni.



Ako si môžete objednať našu službu RYDE ?
Postačí Vám stiahnutie našej mobilnej aplikácie RYDE do vášho smartfónu a môžete začať cestovať. 
- Spustite aplikáciu, zvoľte štart a cieľ svojej cesty.
- Ponuka cestovného sa Vám zobrazí ešte pred objednaním jazdy.
- Objednáte si prepravu a náš vodič si Vás vyzdvihne.
- Môžete sledovať príjazd Vášho objednaného vodiča.
- Komfortnú a pohodlnú jazdu našim novým bezpečným, moderným vozidlom si užijete. 
- Zaplatiť môžete kartou alebo hotovosťou, je to iba na Vás.
- Cestovné v pomere s kvalitou a pohodlím cestovania bude najnižšia.
- Môžete ohodnotiť svoju jazdu. 
- V appke klienta nájdete všetko, čo potrebujete. 



Našim mottom je „jednotný štandard“, pretože klient bude presne vedieť čo dostane.

Uncover the mysteries of live air traffic in one beautiful and easy to use app. Is it a bird? Is it a plane?! If it’s the latter, Plane Finder can tell you exactly which plane it is.
 
Plane Finder is incredibly easy to use and utterly fascinating. It enables you to see live air traffic patterns with real-time tracking of almost any plane you’re interested in, and in addition to the aircraft’s location you can see its current altitude, its speed and where it’s heading.
 
Get live information on flights - super handy when travelling. You can even be alerted when a particular flight is heading your way, which is useful if you’re trying to catch sight of rare birds such as the Airbus A380.
 
Switch to incredible 3D flight tracking anytime from any aircraft, airport or location on the map seamlessly to view air traffic as never before.
 
There’s a superb augmented-reality option that enables you to point your camera at the sky and see details of the aircraft that’s overhead, and with full support for iOS’s Dark Mode it’s just as handy for night flights as it is for daytime ones.
 
It’s all great fun, but it’s also very practical: in addition to flight tracking there’s extensive airport information, which supplements live arrival and departures with live weather reports for hundreds of airports.
 
Enjoy Plane Finder’s leading edge design as featured in Apple’s “The Power of Dark Mode” and “See it in Dark Mode” Collections 2019.
 
Apple’s App of The Day – Jan 2020 and Top ranking since 2009. Plane Finder is also featured in Gizmodo, CNN, GMA, BBC, Sunday Times, Mail on Sunday, CNET, Wired, GQ Magazine to name a few.
 
Trusted by friends and families of travellers, enthusiasts, pilots, cabin crew and aviation professionals alike. Choose Plane Finder for:
 
•	Live Global Flight Tracking
Quickly find and track flights live on a map and explore live status information
 
•	Switch to 3D Tracking Anytime
Flip instantly to 3D from any aircraft, airport or location on the map

•	Live AR Mode
Point your camera at a plane in the sky to instantly reveal live flight and aircraft information
 
•	Live Airport Information
View real time airport arrival and departure boards plus terminal, gate, baggage and weather information
 
•	Comprehensive Technical Data
Dig deeper into technical aircraft and flight data
 
•	Unlimited Custom Alerts
Never miss a flight, create as many custom notifications as you like and stay informed
 
•	Unlimited Global Playback
Replay interesting flights and watch fascinating air traffic patterns back to 2011
 
•	Unlimited Filters
Simplify your view with powerful filters
 
•	Custom Aircraft Labels
Choose the position, color and content of aircraft labels inc. logo with text label
 
•	Leading Edge Dark Mode
Adopt dark mode, a bold interface perfect for low light
 
•	Curated Map Styles
Switch seamlessly between simple, detailed, hybrid and satellite maps
 
Help and Support
Plane Finder is regularly updated with innovative new features.  Please email support@planefinder.net with any questions or queries, we are happy to help.
 
How does Plane Finder work?
Plane Finder receives real time ADS-B and MLAT signals sent by aircraft to transmit their positional data to land based receivers. This technology is faster than traditional radar and is used for air traffic control and navigation. You can check our worldwide flight tracking coverage for free at www.planefinder.net

- In DOT Tickets app, you can easily buy commuter cards and tickets for journeys on Zealand, Lolland, Falster and Møn.

- With a commuter card you get unlimited access 24 hours a day to journeys by bus (including the harbour bus), S-train, DSB Long-distance and Regional trains, local railway and Øresundstog in Zealand, Lolland, Falster and Møn. If your commuter card is valid in one or more zones in Greater Copenhagen, you will be offered a Metro add-on allowing you to travel by metro. If you have opted out of the Metro add-on and wish to travel by metro a given day, you can purchase a Supplementary ticket for Commuter Card to gain access to the metro. A commuter card is valid for a period min. 30 days and max. 60 days. A commuter card is a personal card and only valid for the person registered on the commuter card.

- Select your journey by entering your place of departure and arrival, either in the form of a stop, address or place. You can also enter the zones you wish to travel from and to on the map. To allow DOT Tickets to find your position, you have to enable the GPS of your device. Accepting localization (GPS) is voluntary, but it is required if you wish to use the fast purchase buttons, and it helps you to see your location on the map with the validity area on your ticket. If you wish to purchase a commuter card between 2 and 8 coherent zones, you may select the zones by tapping on the interactive map.

DOT Tickets app is developed by Din Offentlige Transport (DOT) and is owned by DOT. DOT ensures the collaboration between DSB, Movia and Metroselskabet to help create a better and more cohesive public transport system on Zealand, Lolland, Falster and Møn.

You can purchase these tickets in DOT Tickets app:
• Tickets with 2-8 zones
• Tickets for more than 8 zones between a departure and arrival zone
• Commuter cards
• Commuter card Metro add-on
• Commuter card DSB 1’ Regional Train add-on
• Bicycle ticket (Short, medium and long)
• Supplementary Ticket for Commuter Card (1 zone)
• DSB 1’ Regional Trains supplementary ticket
• City Pass Small for zone 1-4 (24, 48, 72, 96 or 120 hours)
• City Pass Large for zone 1-99 (24, 48, 72, 96 or 120 hours)
• City Pass X-Large for zone 1-299 (24 hours)
• City Pass West for zone 101-199 (24 hours)
• City Pass South for zone 201-299 (24 hours)

Payment is made by MobilePay or payment card. You can save your payment card details and access them via Touch ID, Face ID or a PIN code chosen by you. In that way, you do not have to enter all card details every time you make a purchase. The payment card details are stored with DIBS.

The following cards are accepted for payment:
- Visa/Dankort
- MasterCard
- Visa
- Visa Electron
- Maestro

About Supplementary Ticket for Commuter Card (1 zone): 
• Supplementary Ticket for Commuter Card is only valid with a valid commuter card
• Select the zone by tapping the map. The zone must be adjacent to the validity area on your commuter card.  
• If you need more zones than 1, you are required to buy a regular ticket with the number of zones and validity area that you need.

NOTE:
Remember to buy your mobile ticket before you start your journey.
